ComicInfo.Summary:
Novelist Denise Mina's debut story "Empathy is the Enemy" nears its climax in an issue featuring a cover by artist Lee Bermejo (LEX LUTHOR: MAN OF STEEL). Constantine searches for his missing companion, Chris Cole, and finds a trail of secrets that leads straight to Steve Evans, and Constantine's own death. Mina "works wonders" with this tale, says Entertainment Weekly. John Constantine is searching for his missing companion Chris Cole, and finds a mysterious trail of secrets that point in an odd direction.
